interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Gio Naturals Organic Moroccan Argan Oil, 4 oz - 100% Pure and USDA Certified for Face, Hair, Skin and Nails
Review Date: 2016/06/15
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6 x 2.2 x 2.1 inches; 8.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '820103119702'}
Review Text: Gio Naturals is the best! Argan oil is great for hair, skin, and nails, and I love using it for all of those purposes. But when you find a brand that takes Argan oil up a notch, it makes Argan oil even better. This brand, Gio, is a wonderful brand because it keeps my dry skin tamed all day long, even in the areas that seem to be the worst. I also love using this brand for my hair too! A little while back I had gotten sick and I remember being in bed for days. During that time I was in bed, I did not comb my hair. Totally not good for the hair. When I finally felt better, I decided to moisturize the knot in my hair with this Gio Argan Oil. I left it on that area for about 15-20 minutes and let it soak into the knot. When I went back to pick the knot, it had magically loosened up so much and came right out with ease! I was so relieved!! I have even started using this oil on my husband's beard. He loves how soft and silky his beard feels when he uses it. Great product that is a must have for me! Will most certainly replace this oil when the need arises. Buyers note: I received this item at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. If you found this review helpful, please remember to vote. Thanks in advance!
Review Title: Gio Naturals is one of the best oil brands I have used........hands down! Very potent formula!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Vktech Hair Buns Accessories 2pcs Sponge Swelling Curvature Volume Hair Base Vktech {} I was excited when I ordered these because I like to make a high poof ponytail from time to time. Unfortunately, these are not going to give me the kind of poof I am looking for because both of them are way too small. They do not compare to Bumpits, which I currently use. The reason I wanted to get these is because I thought it would not show as much as the plastic Bumpits and I thought it would give the same effect. These are not even big enough to give the effect the picture shows. A little disappointed with these! Will have to keep searching for sponges that are big enough. :( Too small, not exactly like the picture shows! Vktech Hair Buns Accessories 2pcs Sponge Swelling Curvature Volume Hair Base Vktech {} I was excited when I ordered these because I like to make a high poof ponytail from time to time. Unfortunately, these are not going to give me the kind of poof I am looking for because both of them are way too small. They do not compare to Bumpits, which I currently use. The reason I wanted to get these is because I thought it would not show as much as the plastic Bumpits and I thought it would give the same effect. These are not even big enough to give the effect the picture shows. A little disappointed with these! Will have to keep searching for sponges that are big enough. :( Too small, not exactly like the picture shows! SDB Brush Hair Straightener,Anion Hair Care, Anti Scald,Instant Magic Silky Straight Hair Styling,Massage Straightening Irons, Detangling Hair Brush,Zero Damage Pink {'Package Dimensions': '13.6 x 5.7 x 3.4 inches; 1.65 Pounds', 'UPC': '725090611362'} I was hesitant to buy one of these because I already have a cabinet full of failed beauty products that I don't use, however my daughter kept asking for one of these straightening brushes to see if it would work on her naturally, thick and curly hair. I am very pleased to report that it really does work! My daughter is bi-racial, and her hair is very unruly sometimes. Most days it is a job in itself just to get her hair brushed. The wonderful feature of this brush is that you can use it directly after a blow dry to straighten the hair even further. It is also very easy to handle so my teenage daughter was able to use this by herself without any burns or accidents.

Before you ask where the before picture is, my daughter was not open to having her wild and crazy hair all over the internet, so we had to skip that picture, but I did include an after picture to show how smooth and silky her hair turned out after using this brush. Features include a long enough cord that you can maneuver around a bit. The temperature controls go from a low of about 330 F to a high of about 450 F, which I think is enough for most hair types without burning the hair. Another great feature is that you are not pulling the hair as much as you have to when you are using a flat iron, so there is a lot less pressure on the hair. Overall, great tool to have! Makes your life a little bit easier and you can breeze through straightening the hair a lot faster. I did receive this item at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased review, however that has no bearing on my views and opinions. Wow, I like it! It really does work with a little effort! SDB Brush Hair Straightener,Anion Hair Care, Anti Scald,Instant Magic Silky Straight Hair Styling,Massage Straightening Irons, Detangling Hair Brush,Zero Damage Pink {'Package Dimensions': '13.6 x 5.7 x 3.4 inches; 1.65 Pounds', 'UPC': '725090611362'} I was hesitant to buy one of these because I already have a cabinet full of failed beauty products that I don't use, however my daughter kept asking for one of these straightening brushes to see if it would work on her naturally, thick and curly hair. profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Preference for Hair Accessories**: The user highly values products that enhance hairstyle volume and height, particularly favoring voluminous, high poofy ponytails. 
- **Disappointment with Size and Effectiveness**: They remain critical of product size and effectiveness, expressing dissatisfaction when results do not match promotional images or expectations.
- **Comparison to Competitors**: With experience across various brands, the user prefers accessories that deliver results comparable to those they have successfully used for volume enhancement.
- **Value for Aesthetic**: They seek hair accessories that blend discreetly with their natural hair, aiming for a minimalist look while avoiding overly visible products.
- **Seeking the Right Fit**: Continuously searching for optimal volume solutions, they emphasize the need for adequately sized sponges that meet their height expectations.
- **Versatility in Hair Tools**: The user has shown interest in multifunctional tools, reflecting a growing appreciation for products that address both hair and skin needs. Their recent experience with a versatile oil that alleviated dryness has reinforced this trend, showcasing their preference for effective, multi-use products that enhance overall hair management.
- **Open to Quality Recommendations**: They prioritize quality, effectiveness, and user-friendly designs, appreciating well-rated products that enhance their hair care routine and styling versatility.

Overall, the user’s preferences highlight their focus on premium products that deliver tangible benefits while ensuring visual discretion and versatility.
